title: Saul Meets Samuel
summary: 1 Samuel 9 introduces Saul, a tall and impressive young man from the tribe of Benjamin. While searching for his father’s lost donkeys, Saul meets Samuel, who has been told by God to anoint him as king.

faq.question: Who was Saul?
faq.answer: A Benjamite, described as tall and handsome—chosen by God to be Israel’s first king.

faq.question: Why did Saul visit Samuel?
faq.answer: While searching for lost donkeys, his servant suggested asking the prophet Samuel for help.
